programme.title: Hobo with a Shotgun
programme.desc: Revenge drama starring Rutger Hauer. A homeless man drifts into a town where local mobsters run riot, and decides to take a stand. programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jonah Hill and Michael Cera as Seth and Evan, two boys bonded by their lack of popularity. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-September 2024
programme.desc: Going to the cinema isn’t the cheap date it used to be, so be sure to make the most of these offers to watch a movie for less. Here are the best ways to get cheap cinema tickets this month.

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: A woman who has rarely been without a boyfriend moves to New York following a break-up with her latest beau. She makes a fun-loving new friend, who introduces her to the city's nightlife and teaches her to enjoy the advantages of being single. programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Romantic comedy adapted from the bestselling novel by Helen Fielding, starring Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth and Hugh Grant. Weight-obsessed 30-something Bridget Jones is busy lamenting her lack of a good man when two come along at once: her flirtatious boss Daniel Cleaver and uptight childhood friend Mark Darcy. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman and Angelina Jolie. Ancient China: Po the Panda lives in the Valley of Peace and dreams of becoming a kung fu master despite the fact he is clumsy, overweight and a complete beginner at martial arts. So when he's accidentally chosen to be the legendary Dragon Warrior, he is overjoyed. programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Action, Animation, Children's ║ 2013 ║ U
programme.desc: Part-animated comedy starring Neil Patrick Harris. After all her friends appear to have forgotten her birthday, Smurfette runs away from the village, only to be snatched through a portal to the real world, by the evil Gargamel. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. Soon she discovers that a power company has been dumping toxic waste and poisoning the residents of a small town. programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. A bookie is shot and fatally wounded by a mysterious woman while visiting the news-stand of deaf former actor Dave Lyons and his blind assistant Wally. Before dying, the bookie secretes what appears to be a rare coin in the stand's cash box. Dave and Wally are subsequently arrested for murder and embark on a chaotic quest to prove their innocence Arthur Hiller - Director Gene Wilder - Dave Lyons Richard Pryor - Wally Karew Joan Severance - Eve Kevin Spacey - Kirgo Alan North - Captain Braddock Anthony Zerbe - Sutherland Louis Giambalvo - Gatlin Kirsten Childs - Adele Hardy Rawls - Tourist Audrie Neenan - Policewoman / Marilyn Lauren Tom - Mitzie Gene Wilder - Dave Lyons Richard Pryor - Wally Karew Joan Severance - Eve Kevin Spacey - Kirgo Alan North - Captain Braddock Anthony Zerbe - Sutherland Louis Giambalvo - Gatlin Kirsten Childs - Adele Hardy Rawls - Tourist Audrie Neenan - Policewoman / Marilyn Lauren Tom - Mitzie.

programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: Shakespeare's battle-of-the-sexes comedy starring Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor. Padua in the late 16th century: rich merchant Baptista declares that his young daughter Bianca must remain unwed until her older sister Katharina is married. programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman. A young woman has a car accident and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker. programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Will Spann is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents' home when she mysteriously disappears without a trace during a stop at a gas station. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisa's parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. programme.desc: A bet to finance a crap game sees a gambler challenged to take a female missionary to Havana, but the pair fall for each other. Hit musical with Marlon Brando. (1955)(150 mins).

programme.desc: Pampered African prince Eddie Murphy escapes to America to find the girl of his dreams. Will he find her working at a fast-food joint? Comedy. Contains strong language/sex. (1988)(111 mins).

programme.desc: Ang Lee directs the Oscar-winning martial arts epic about the hunt for a legendary blade. Chow Yun-Fat stars. Mandarin with subtitles. (2000)(116 mins).

programme.desc: Classic WWII epic about an engineer's daring plan to use bouncing bombs and low-flying aircraft to destroy a series of German dams. Richard Todd and Michael Redgrave star. (1955)(124 mins).

programme.title: SPFL 18/19: Rangers v Celtic
programme.desc: Rangers take on Celtic at Ibrox in the SPFL Ladbrokes Premiership. A win for Rangers draws them level with the visitors at the top, while a win for Celtic puts them six points clear.

programme.title: SPFL 18/19: Celtic v Rangers

programme.title: SPFL 18/19: Rangers v Celtic

programme.title: SPFL 19/20: Rangers v Celtic
